TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AspNetCompiler extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ToolTaskExtension

summary.span: 实现 AspNetCompiler 任务。

span.span: Implements the AspNetCompiler task.

summary.span: 使用项目文件中的 AspNetCompiler 元素创建和执行此任务。

span.span: Use the AspNetCompiler element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 有关用法和参数信息，请参阅 [AspNetCompiler 任务](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f811c019-a67b-4d54-82e6-e29549496f6e)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [AspNetCompiler Task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f811c019-a67b-4d54-82e6-e29549496f6e).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示 （允许部分受信任的调用方访问程序集）是否应该应用于 Aspnet_compiler.exe 生成的具有强名称的程序集。

value.span: 如果 应该应用于 Aspnet_compiler.exe 生成的具有强名称的程序集，则为 ；否则为 。

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否将以全新方式生成预编译的应用程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the precompiled application will be built clean.

value.span: 如果将以全新方式生成预编译的应用程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the precompiled application will be built clean; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为`true`, 则将重新编译以前编译过的任何组件。If this property is `true`, any previously compiled components will be recompiled. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否应该为应用程序中的每个页面生成一个程序集。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether one assembly should be generated for each page in the application.

value.span: 如果应该为应用程序中的每个页面生成一个程序集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if one assembly should be generated for each page in the application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个程序集都命名为带有原始页的虚拟路径, 除非该名称超出文件名的操作系统限制, 在这种情况下, 将生成哈希并将其用于程序集名称。Each assembly is named with the virtual path of the original page unless the name would exceed the operating system limit for file names, in which case a hash is generated and used for the assembly name. 不能将此属性用于就地编译;就地编译采用编译批处理模式的配置设置。You cannot use this property for in-place compilation; in-place compilation honors configuration settings for compilation batch mode.

span.span: The physical path of the application to be compiled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果缺少此属性, 则使用 IIS 元数据库来查找应用程序。If this property is missing, the IIS metabase is used to locate the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅接受 .NET Framework 名字对象。Only accepts .NET Framework monikers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定，则将就地预编译应用程序。If not specified, the application is precompiled in-place.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VirtualPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VirtualPath : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要编译的应用程序的虚拟路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the virtual path of the application to be compiled.

value.span: 要编译的应用程序的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path of the application to be compiled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定 `PhysicalPath`，则物理路径将用于查找应用程序。If `PhysicalPath` specified, the physical path is used to locate the application. 否则，将使用 IIS 元数据库，并假定应用程序位于默认站点中。Otherwise, the IIS metabase is used, and the application is assumed to be in the default site.
